item.label: Line Break
item.shortDesc: The element is used to enforce a line break.

item.label: Button
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=SUBMIT represents an input option, typically a button, that instructs the user agent to submit the form.

item.label: Check Box
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=CHECKBOX represents a boolean choice. A set of such elements with the same name represents an n-of-many choice field.

item.label: Form
item.shortDesc: The FORM element contains a sequence of input elements, along with document structuring elements.

item.label: Hidden Field
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=HIDDEN represents a hidden field.The user does not interact with this field; instead, the VALUE attribute specifies the value of the field.

item.label: Horizontal Rule
item.shortDesc: The HR element is a divider between sections of text; typically a full width horizontal rule or equivalent graphic.

item.label: Image
item.shortDesc: The IMG element refers to an image or icon via a hyperlink.

item.label: Image Button
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=IMAGE specifies an image resource to display, and allows input of two form fields: the x and y coordinate of a pixel chosen from the image.

item.label: Link
item.shortDesc: The element allows the user to navigate the content of the document.

item.label: Password Field
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=PASSWORD is a text field as above, except that the value is obscured as it is entered.

item.label: Radio Button
item.shortDesc: An INPUT element with TYPE=RADIO represents a boolean choice. A set of such elements with the same name represents a 1-of-many choice field.

item.label: Select
item.shortDesc: The SELECT element constrains the form field to an enumerated list of values.

item.label: Table
item.shortDesc: HTML Tables are contained within a TABLE element. The TABLE element denotes the range of the table, and uses attribute to define properties of it.

item.label: Text Area
item.shortDesc: The TEXTAREA element represents a multi-line text field.

item.label: Text Field
item.shortDesc: The default vaule of the TYPE attribute is TEXT, indicating a single line text entry field.
